name: 狄雅南
objective: This course contents heat transfer, mass transfer and its application.
schedule:
(1) Principles of Steady-State Heat Transfer (Chap. 4) 
(2) Principles of Unsteady-State Heat Transfer (Chap. 5)
(3) Principles of Mass Transfer (Chap. 6)  
(4) Principles of Unsteady-State and Convective Mass Transfer (Chap. 7)
scorePolicy:
Quiz (2 times)　　　　　　　　　　　　　　25 % 
Mid-term　　        　　　　　　　　　　　　25 %
Final Exam 　　　　　　　　　　　　　　30 %
Homework, Classroom participants (Q&A)　　20 %
materials:
1.Geankoplis, C. J., Transport Processes and Unit Operations, 4thed., Allyn and Bacon series in engineering, Boston, Massachusetts (1978). 
2. McCabe, W.L., Smith, J.C., Harriott, P., Unit Operations of Chemical Engineering, 7thed., McGraw-Hills (2017).
